title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended by the
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended by the 
substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for Schedule 3 to those 
Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [440] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
make amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events” currently provided 
for under the Regulations, including a number of additional events. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [440] 7
